title: 【Mob Masks Add-on】 - 生物面具【1.13/1.14】
author: 爱心魔王FHC
txt_content:
本帖最后由 爱心魔王FHC 于 2020-3-17 14:10 编辑 

Mob Masks Add-onThis add-on adds new mobs masks to your game! There are 28 new attachable and craftable masks that you can make on your survival and have fun. These masks are crafted with ink dyes. You will see on this page all the crafting recipes from mob masks!这个MOD添加了28个生物面具，可以用来和你的小伙伴愉快的玩耍，面具是由染料合成的作者：Team Infinite Minds (Twitter Account), Jean Lucas (Twitter Account)如何制作？To make any mob mask, you need the empty mask. With the empty mask you will use dye variations of the mob colors to “paint” the empty mask using the crafting table, and create your mob mask. For example, to make a creeper mask, you will need green and black dye. These are the creeper colors!你需要一个空白面具来合成任意的生物面具，在工作台中，可以在空白面具上添加各种生物颜色有的染料，然后创造出你自己的面具。例如，制造一个苦力怕面具，你需要绿色和黑色染料，这也是苦力怕的颜色如何使用？Android: To equip a mask on Android, click and hold the screen with the mask in hand.安卓：手里拿着面具单击并按住屏幕即可带上Windows 10: To equip a mask on Windows 10, click and hold the right mouse button with the mask in hand.win10：手里拿着面具右键并按住即可带上To remove the mask from the player slot, simply remove it from the slot as you do with the armor.拿掉面具就和你拿掉装备的操作是一样的合成表空白面具

游戏版本1.13/1.14下载支持作者请去原帖下载
百度网盘、百度云: https://pan.baidu.com/s/1Gin1LO_aq0rxT0boglVu2w
提取码: sht3注意在创建世界的时候要打开“Use experimental gameplay”选项
